attributes.action: Put a cap on energy prices and more help for the vulnerable
attributes.additional_details: It will mean that there won't be as many deaths. People will be able to heat their home in winter and have nutrional meals. The worry and anxiety on how they are going to pay for their energy costs will be reduced as there will be maximum out they can be charges. There will not be as many elderly people struggling and having to go into hospital
attributes.background: I want the government to put price cap on energy prices. Have a maximum amount that people need to pay  on low incomes and pay the help with energy costs to the supplier and not to benefit claimant

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There is already an energy price cap, which is set by Ofgem.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
